XIV.2.A.1.b
.
EP Establishment
An end product (EP) 150
PMC-Soc Sec Admn Match
with special issue
Upfront Verification
will be established by the system when a case is identified that requires correction based on a match with SSA payment data.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section A - Social Security Income Match
